plot: We follow the story of underground fighters 'Sai Hu' and 'Hei Xiong' as they show us what life is like for underground fighters outside of the fighting arena.
title: Man Is Beast
plot_es: We follow the story of underground fighters 'Sai Hu' and 'Hei Xiong' as they show us what life is like for underground fighters outside of the fighting arena.
plot_en: We follow the story of underground fighters 'Sai Hu' and 'Hei Xiong' as they show us what life is like for underground fighters outside of the fighting arena.
